servinfo.title: DTC P0110: Intake Air Temperature Sensor 1 Circuit Malfunction

item.ptxt: Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after an attempted start, or with the engine running.
The air temperature value changes to safe mode, “Intake Air Temp” on Data List of SUZUKI scan tool = 45.1 °C, 113.2 °F.
Use service wire for all operations on the ECM connectors.

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: For wiring circuit and connector number, refer to A-5 Engine and A/C Control System Circuit Diagram (DSL) .

entry.ptxt: Short circuit to vehicle body ground
Open circuit or short circuit to +12 V

servinfosub.title: Troubleshooting for CO.1: Open circuit or short circuit to +12 V

entry.ptxt: Check the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connections.
Check the continuity of the following connection:

item.ptxt: Between “C13-4” wire of sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “E33-6” terminal of Main relay mounting connector

entry.ptxt: Check the continuity and insulation against +12 V of the following connections:

item.ptxt: Between “C13-1” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-22” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-2” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-24” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-5” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-47” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-6” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-12” terminal of ECM connector

entry.ptxt: Measure the air temperature sensor resistance between “C13-1” and “C13-2” terminals of the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector.

spec.title: Replace the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor if the resistance displayed is not:

servinfosub.title: Troubleshooting for CC.0: Short circuit to vehicle body ground

entry.ptxt: Check the connections of the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor.Check the ECM connections.
Check the continuity and insulation against vehicle body ground of the connection between:

item.ptxt: Between “C13-1” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-22” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-2” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-24” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-5” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “C86-47” terminal of ECM connector
Between “C13-4” wire of MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector and “E33-6” terminal of main relay mounting connector

entry.ptxt: Measure the air temperature sensor resistance between “C13-1” and “C13-2” terminals of the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor connector.

spec.title: Replace the MAF sensor assembly with IAT sensor if the resistance displayed is not:
